title: BaseRouteReuseStrategy
contents:
API > @angular/router
mode_edit code

BaseRouteReuseStrategylink

此基本路由複用策略僅在匹配的路由器配置完全相同時複用路由。這樣可以防止僅在片段或查詢引數發生更改時銷燬和重新建立元件（也就是複用現有元件）。

This base route reuse strategy only reuses routes when the matched router configs are identical. This prevents components from being destroyed and recreated when just the fragment or query parameters change (that is, the existing component is reused).

檢視"說明"...

abstract class BaseRouteReuseStrategy implements RouteReuseStrategy { shouldDetach(route: ActivatedRouteSnapshot): boolean store(route: ActivatedRouteSnapshot, detachedTree: DetachedRouteHandle): void shouldAttach(route: ActivatedRouteSnapshot): boolean retrieve(route: ActivatedRouteSnapshot): DetachedRouteHandle | null shouldReuseRoute(future: ActivatedRouteSnapshot, curr: ActivatedRouteSnapshot): boolean }

說明link

此策略不儲存任何路由供以後複用。

Angular 預設使用此策略。

它可以用作自訂路由複用策略的基底類別，即，你可以建立自己的類來擴充 BaseRouteReuseStrategy 。

This strategy does not store any routes for later reuse.

Angular uses this strategy by default.

It can be used as a base class for custom route reuse strategies, i.e. you can create your own class that extends the BaseRouteReuseStrategy one.

方法link

shouldDetach() link

mode_edit code

給定的路由是否應該分離以便以後複用。BaseRouteReuseStrategy 始終返回 false。

Whether the given route should detach for later reuse. Always returns false for BaseRouteReuseStrategy.
shouldDetach(route: ActivatedRouteSnapshot): boolean
引數
route ActivatedRouteSnapshot
返回值

boolean

store() link

mode_edit code

無操作；永遠不會儲存該路由，因為此策略永遠不會分離路由以供以後複用。

A no-op; the route is never stored since this strategy never detaches routes for later re-use.
store(route: ActivatedRouteSnapshot, detachedTree: DetachedRouteHandle): void
引數
route ActivatedRouteSnapshot
detachedTree DetachedRouteHandle
返回值

void

shouldAttach() link

mode_edit code

返回 false ，表示路由（及其子樹）從不重新連線

Returns false, meaning the route (and its subtree) is never reattached
shouldAttach(route: ActivatedRouteSnapshot): boolean
引數
route ActivatedRouteSnapshot
返回值

boolean

retrieve() link

mode_edit code

返回 null，因為此策略不儲存路由供以後複用。

Returns null because this strategy does not store routes for later re-use.
retrieve(route: ActivatedRouteSnapshot): DetachedRouteHandle | null
引數
route ActivatedRouteSnapshot
返回值

DetachedRouteHandle | null

shouldReuseRoute() link

mode_edit code

確定是否應複用路由。當將來的路由配置和當前的路由配置相同時，此策略將返回 true

Determines if a route should be reused. This strategy returns true when the future route config and current route config are identical.
shouldReuseRoute(future: ActivatedRouteSnapshot, curr: ActivatedRouteSnapshot): boolean
引數
future ActivatedRouteSnapshot
curr ActivatedRouteSnapshot
返回值

boolean
